title: Jimi Hendrix - Black Gold Volumes 1-3 (5CD-Box 1996) [FLAC]
description:
Jimi Hendrix - Black Gold Volumes 1-3 (5CD-Box 1996) [FLAC]


Notes
Not the famous Black Gold that was possibly to be Jimi's fifth album but rather a very fine collection of Electric Ladyland outtakes and rehearsals.


Jimi Hendrix - Black Gold
Label: Midnight Beat - MB CD 058/59/60/61/62
Format: 5 Ãƒâ€” CD, Unofficial Release, Box Set, Limited edition of 1000 numbered copies.
Country: Luxembourg
Released: 1996
Genre: Rock
Style: Psychedelic Rock, Blues Rock


Unofficial release - excellent sound quality A+++
